title: Restore deployability while enforcing Mock Mode and WhatsApp dummy CTA

requirements.summary: Revert/neutralize recent frontend changes likely causing safety-flag deployment failure while keeping the current Goa Planner UI intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Project builds and deploys without triggering a safety-flag failure.
Core app screen (“Desi Musafir - Goa Planner” landing page with form + results section) still renders after the reset.

file_operations.description: Remove non-essential debug behavior and tighten UI-only interactions to reduce risk of deployment safety-flag triggers while keeping the existing results UI intact (e.g., replace the Food Spots click handler console logging with a no-op or safe placeholder). Uses shadcn-ui Card/Alert/Button already present—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Simplify and correct the derived error/success state wiring passed into results so the UI renders consistently after reset (ensure Mock Mode never surfaces backend/canister errors to the user). Uses shadcn-ui Switch/Label already present—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure Mock Data (Simulation Mode) is enabled by default and bypasses backend calls and backend error UI when planning a trip.
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh load, Mock Mode is enabled by default.
When Mock Mode is enabled, clicking “Plan My Trip” does not call the backend and returns the hardcoded sample itinerary.
No backend/canister errors are shown to the user while Mock Mode is enabled.

file_operations.description: Enforce Mock Mode as the default and ensure the submit flow exclusively triggers the mock mutation when Mock Mode is enabled; also ensure the results props never enter an error state in Mock Mode (so backend/canister errors cannot render). Uses shadcn-ui Switch/Label already present—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Keep the mock planner mutation strictly local/instant (no backend usage) and ensure it always returns the hardcoded sample itinerary used by the UI.

requirements.summary: Update the WhatsApp CTA to always link to the dummy number 919999999999.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Book Now on WhatsApp” button navigates to `https://wa.me/919999999999`.
No other WhatsApp number is used anywhere in the UI for this CTA.

file_operations.description: Create a single source-of-truth constant for the WhatsApp wa.me URL (must be exactly https://wa.me/919999999999) to prevent accidental divergence across the UI.

Wire the “Book Now on WhatsApp” button to the shared WhatsApp URL constant (ensuring the href is exactly https://wa.me/919999999999). Uses shadcn-ui Button/Card already present—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure the mock itinerary includes a parsable Recommended Transport section and that the highlighted transport card renders above the Day-wise Plan in results.
acceptanceCriteria: After clicking “Plan My Trip” in Mock Mode, the highlighted transport card renders with the title text “⭐ Recommended: Rent from Desi Musafir Rentals”.
The transport card is shown above the Day-wise Plan section in the results view.

file_operations.description: Ensure the hardcoded mock itinerary contains a clearly delimited “Recommended Transport” section with parse-friendly lines intended to populate the transport card content (while preserving the current card title expectation).

Harden the itinerary parser so “Recommended Transport” content is reliably extracted in Mock Mode and displayed in the highlighted transport card; ensure only the transport details populate the bullet list (avoid duplicating the star-title line in the list) and keep the card rendered above the Day-wise Plan section. Uses shadcn-ui Card/Button/Separator already present—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
